original_title: 今日、義姉さんが引っ越してきて…。 芦名ユリア
overview: Until his brother Hajime failed in business and found a job, he returned to his parents' house with his sister-in-law Yuria. The stubborn father didn't think of them well, but his younger brother, Jiro, was delighted to live with his beautiful sister-in-law. However, on the day of the move, Yulia is raped by the workers who were tempted by her father. Criminal ● Jiro is shocked by the appearance of his injured sister-in-law and tries to improve the relationship between his brother-in-law and his father. Yuria's heart gradually shakes with the kindness of her brother-in-law.
title: My Sister-in-Law Moved In Today… Yuria Ashina
